Name: Escape the Ayuwoki DEMAKE
About the game: Re-experience the terrifying “Escape the Ayuwoki” through the perspective of a 90's horror video game. Fixed Camera shots Retro controls Inventory / Item mixing system Retro cinematics Retro 3D character models The Ayuwoki’s mansion is now a horrifying retro place that will make you remember of the first horror videogames. Additionally, this new installment brings all the original places and objectives to a new perspective. Explore all chapters through fixed cameras, solve more complex puzzles and even explore the game’s lore to the old fashioned way. Escape as soon as you can while trying to survive in this immersive horror experience where the Ayuwoki can hear you through your mic.
